title: Magnum P.I. S03E03 Ki'i's Don't Lie NTSC (Original) End
description:
Magnum P.I.
S03E03 Ki&#039;i&#039;s Don&#039;t Lie NTSC (Original) Ending

This is a Crossover Episode from the Magnum P.I. Season 1 Bonus Disc.  This episode is Part 1 of a two-part series, Magnum P.I. episode S03E03 Ki&#039;i&#039;s Don&#039;t Lie.  

This is the NTSC version with the original ending that ties it in to the Simon and Simon episode S02E01 Emeralds Are Not a Girl&#039;s Best Friend (2).  At the end of this episode, Morgan Fairchild is airborne, on her way to LA after having absconded with Higgins&#039; charity money.  Magnum and Higgins chase her to the airport, but her plane has already taken off.  Magnum injures his shoulder in a fight with the Antique Dealer&#039;s goon and is taken away by the airport police, so Higgins flies after Morgan Fairchild alone.   Rick and AJ return to LA to find Morgan Fairchild and the money, and Magnum and his two guys are en route to return the Ki&#039;i to it&#039;s Kahuna&#039;s island.

Apparently the PAL version of Magnum P.I. S03E03 ends with Higgins capturing Morgan Fairchild, and the audio is out of sync with what the characters are actually saying (thanks to Demonoider legenda for this info).  (I&#039;m not a Magnum viewer so I apologize if I erred in any of the character&#039;s names.)
